name: Billy's Fishy Adventure
description:
Objective:

Avoid the bombs and grab the plastic bottles.

Controls:
W = Float up
S = Dive
D = Move Forwards

Level Progression:
level 1: get 30 points
level 2: get 50 points
level 3: get 100 points

Music found on Freesound.org and created by: pushtobreak

https://freesound.org/people/pushtobreak/sounds/17824/
